attributes.additional_details: Liverpool FC should not be allowed to compete in any competitions until it accept calling some a Negro is any circumstance is not acceptable. Its continual support of players that use such words is giving a free licence to its  supporters to destroy the good work the authorities are doing to stamp out racism in football. Until they formally distance themselves from their employees actions they should no longer be allowed to operate in the UK.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the the FA, the Premier League and UEFA which organise the competitions.
